channel.title: A generation of stupidity
channel.description:
Back in my day when I needed money I went and mined ess or fished...
But since bots have dominated for a year theres a small portion of players who don't realize how profitable that is, and they resort to "doubling money"
discuss idiots

item.title: A generation of stupidity
item.dc:creator: @judostar1 judostar1
item.description:
@judostar1 wrote:

[quote=“lostmyphat, post:24, topic:420185”][quote author=judostar1 link=topic=522742.msg3802221#msg3802221 date=1320112366]

I don’t think any newfag will be able to truly know how happy one could be getting a rune med drop at lessers… Nowadays people bitch when Armadyl doesn’t drop his hilt.

Dicing = scam
Doubling = scam
Trust game = scam
Dropping items in any form = scam
Clan wars purple portal = scam

The list goes on. To much shit nowadays, not enough content.

dicing isn’t a scam sometimes. I’ve hosted, never scammed.
[/quote]

Either way you are relying that the person is reliable and you can trust them, would you scam someone of 1b if you had the chance?[/quote]

no. Besides, I have a max amount for bets. It’s currently like 3m.

Read full topic

The list goes on. To much shit nowadays, not enough content.

dicing isn’t a scam sometimes. I’ve hosted, never scammed.[/quote]

Either way you are relying that the person is reliable and you can trust them, would you scam someone of 1b if you had the chance?

item.title: A generation of stupidity
item.dc:creator: @badger41 badger41
item.description:
@badger41 wrote:

theyve already announced they have something in store for gold farmers, but im sure they have a few ideas to enact to combat scammers

but if you look at it through another point of view, its actually a good thing people dont know how to make money, itll give value to the lesser items once again

Read full topic

item.title: A generation of stupidity
item.dc:creator: @judostar1 judostar1
item.description:
@judostar1 wrote:

[quote=“casey., post:21, topic:420185”]The way I see runescape:

50% dicing/staking
30 % game content
15% PK
5% other

Laziness is defiantly a factor today than back a few years ago. People expect things to be done for them like the bots did. Good thing times have changed.[/quote]

I’m rather happy bots are gone. the drags and shit are no longer packed with like 15 to 20 people.

Read full topic

item.title: A generation of stupidity
item.dc:creator: @the_elve_age the elve age
item.description:
@the_elve_age wrote:

Really Frell, your point is completely valid. Just wait 1-2 weeks when a good proportion of the supplies are used up (ess, cooked sharks, rocktails, gold ore). Prices will soon start shooting up.

…Now that I think about it though, with less bots that USED the supplies, the supply will still be high. So wait a month or two of no botting.

Read full topic

item.title: A generation of stupidity
item.dc:creator: @judostar1 judostar1
item.description:
@judostar1 wrote:

[quote=“Frell, post:13, topic:420185”][quote author=judostar1 link=topic=522742.msg3802221#msg3802221 date=1320112366]

I don’t think any newfag will be able to truly know how happy one could be getting a rune med drop at lessers… Nowadays people bitch when Armadyl doesn’t drop his hilt.

Dicing = scam
Doubling = scam
Trust game = scam
Dropping items in any form = scam
Clan wars purple portal = scam

The list goes on. To much shit nowadays, not enough content.

dicing isn’t a scam sometimes. I’ve hosted, never scammed.
[/quote]
Dicing is only profitable for hosters…[/quote]

I was a hoster? and when people did get over 55 (56+) 55x2 most usual dicing type. Anyways when people did get over 55, i would double what they gave me.

anyways I’ve learned how to make cash without essence and shit.

Read full topic

item.title: A generation of stupidity

item.description:

[quote=“mihalich, post:7, topic:420185”][quote author=Andrew Ferguson link=topic=522742.msg3802154#msg3802154 date=1320109458]
I went from 2m cash, to 368m cash in 20 minutes, logged in today, made a few bets, and now i’m back to 35gp. I quit rs.
[/quote]
You are the 1%[/quote]
Can’t tell if that is good or bad, but either way… Yay! I’m rare.

item.dc:creator: @mihalich mihalich
item.description:
@mihalich wrote:

Idiots are idiots.

But ye a lot of people don’t want to put an effort towards the game so they resort to scamming basically. Skilling is what the game was basically built on but has been lost along the way.

EDIT: Since bots are gone I’ve actually been woodcutting!
